file(COPY  bug_1806.cir bug_1806.cir.sh bug_1806_2.cir bug_1806_2a.cir exclude tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1806.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1806/bug_1806.cir.sh COMMAND bash bug_1806.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1806.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1806/bug_1806.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1806/bug_1806.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;subckt;param;expression;bsrc;valgrind;bug1806")
endif()
